alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:58PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong outflow wind gusts will impact portions of central Carbon County through 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Muddy Gap to 8 miles northeast of Separation Lake to 13 miles southeast of Sinclair to near Bottle Creek Campground. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rawlins, Saratoga, Hanna, Encampment, Sinclair, Grand Encampment, Battle Lake, Muddy Gap, Haskins Creek Campground, Teton Reservoir, Seminoe Dam, Ryan Park Campground, Separation Lake, Lost Creek Campground, Little Sandstone Creek Campground, Bottle Creek Campground, Battle Creek Campground, Hog Park Reservoir, French Creek Campground and Seminoe Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 204 and 253. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin
